trans-unit.source: Using Office with Azure RemoteApp
trans-unit.target: Using Office with Azure RemoteApp

trans-unit.source: You have two choices for hosting Office applications in Azure RemoteApp: Office 365 ProPlus or Office 2013 Professional Plus Trial.
trans-unit.target: You have two choices for hosting Office applications in Azure RemoteApp: Office 365 ProPlus or Office 2013 Professional Plus Trial.

trans-unit.source: **Hey, did you know we have a new, better article that will soon replace this?
trans-unit.target: **Hey, did you know we have a new, better article that will soon replace this?

trans-unit.source: Check out <link><linkText>How to use your Office 365 subscription with Azure RemoteApp</linkText><title></title></link>.
trans-unit.target: Check out <link><linkText>How to use your Office 365 subscription with Azure RemoteApp</linkText><title></title></link>.

trans-unit.source: It covers all the info you need for using Office 365 + Azure RemoteApp.**
trans-unit.target: It covers all the info you need for using Office 365 + Azure RemoteApp.**

trans-unit.source: Office 365 ProPlus
trans-unit.target: Office 365 ProPlus

trans-unit.source: You can create a RemoteApp collection using the Office 365 ProPlus template image.
trans-unit.target: You can create a RemoteApp collection using the Office 365 ProPlus template image.

trans-unit.source: This option allows you to extend your Office 365 service to RemoteApp.
trans-unit.target: This option allows you to extend your Office 365 service to RemoteApp.

trans-unit.source: You must have an existing subscription plan and your users must be licensed for the Office 365 ProPlus service, either standalone or through the Office 365 service plans.
trans-unit.target: You must have an existing subscription plan and your users must be licensed for the Office 365 ProPlus service, either standalone or through the Office 365 service plans.

trans-unit.source: RemoteApp supports Office 365 Shared Computer Activation.
trans-unit.target: RemoteApp supports Office 365 Shared Computer Activation.

trans-unit.source: When you enable Shared Computer Activation, and use the <link><linkText>Office Deployment tool</linkText><title></title></link> for installation, Office 365 ProPlus installs without being activated.
trans-unit.target: When you enable Shared Computer Activation, and use the <link><linkText>Office Deployment tool</linkText><title></title></link> for installation, Office 365 ProPlus installs without being activated.

trans-unit.source: When a user signs into a collection that contains Office 365, Office checks to see if the user has been provisioned for Office 365 ProPlus.
trans-unit.target: When a user signs into a collection that contains Office 365, Office checks to see if the user has been provisioned for Office 365 ProPlus.

trans-unit.source: If so, Office temporarily activates Office 365 ProPlus - this activation persists until that users signs out of the service.
trans-unit.target: If so, Office temporarily activates Office 365 ProPlus - this activation persists until that users signs out of the service.

trans-unit.source: To use Office 365 Shared Computer Activation, you need to create a <link><linkText>custom template</linkText><title></title></link> and install Office 365 ProPlus there, following <link><linkText>these directions</linkText><title></title></link>.
trans-unit.target: To use Office 365 Shared Computer Activation, you need to create a <link><linkText>custom template</linkText><title></title></link> and install Office 365 ProPlus there, following <link><linkText>these directions</linkText><title></title></link>.

trans-unit.source: You can manage your users’ Office 365 licenses at the <link><linkText>Office 365 Admin Portal</linkText><title></title></link>.
trans-unit.target: You can manage your users’ Office 365 licenses at the <link><linkText>Office 365 Admin Portal</linkText><title></title></link>.

trans-unit.source: Read more information about <link><linkText>Office 365 service plans</linkText><title></title></link>.
trans-unit.target: Read more information about <link><linkText>Office 365 service plans</linkText><title></title></link>.

trans-unit.source: Office 2013 Professional Plus Trial
trans-unit.target: Office 2013 Professional Plus Trial

trans-unit.source: During a 30-day trial of RemoteApp, you can use the Office 2013 Professional Plus (trial) template image to create a RemoteApp collection.
trans-unit.target: During a 30-day trial of RemoteApp, you can use the Office 2013 Professional Plus (trial) template image to create a RemoteApp collection.

trans-unit.source: You can assign users to this trial collection using their Azure Active Directory work accounts or Microsoft accounts.
trans-unit.target: You can assign users to this trial collection using their Azure Active Directory work accounts or Microsoft accounts.

trans-unit.source: No additional subscription is required.
trans-unit.target: No additional subscription is required.

trans-unit.source: This is a great option to kick the tires and get a good feeling for Office in RemoteApp.
trans-unit.target: This is a great option to kick the tires and get a good feeling for Office in RemoteApp.

trans-unit.source: However, this option is intended for evaluation and testing only.
trans-unit.target: However, this option is intended for evaluation and testing only.

trans-unit.source: RemoteApp collections created using the Office 2013 Professional Plus (trial) template image cannot be transitioned to production mode and will be disabled at the end of the trial period.
trans-unit.target: RemoteApp collections created using the Office 2013 Professional Plus (trial) template image cannot be transitioned to production mode and will be disabled at the end of the trial period.

trans-unit.source: Switching from trial to production
trans-unit.target: Switching from trial to production

trans-unit.source: When you start your 30-day free trial, a note in the RemoteApp section of the portal will tell you how long you have left in the trial before you need to transition to a paid account.
trans-unit.target: When you start your 30-day free trial, a note in the RemoteApp section of the portal will tell you how long you have left in the trial before you need to transition to a paid account.

trans-unit.source: You can activate your account and switch to production mode using the link in this note.
trans-unit.target: You can activate your account and switch to production mode using the link in this note.

trans-unit.source: When you activate your account, this will affect all the RemoteApp collections in your account.
trans-unit.target: When you activate your account, this will affect all the RemoteApp collections in your account.

trans-unit.source: Collections that are running with the Windows Server 2012 R2 or the Office 365 ProPlus template images will transition to production seamlessly.
trans-unit.target: Collections that are running with the Windows Server 2012 R2 or the Office 365 ProPlus template images will transition to production seamlessly.

trans-unit.source: All user data and settings, including ongoing sessions, remain intact.
trans-unit.target: All user data and settings, including ongoing sessions, remain intact.

trans-unit.source: If you have uploaded custom template images, collections using those images will also transition seamlessly.
trans-unit.target: If you have uploaded custom template images, collections using those images will also transition seamlessly.

trans-unit.source: The Office 2013 Professional Plus (Trial) template image is intended for evaluation only.
trans-unit.target: The Office 2013 Professional Plus (Trial) template image is intended for evaluation only.

trans-unit.source: Collections running with this template image cannot be transitioned to production.
trans-unit.target: Collections running with this template image cannot be transitioned to production.

trans-unit.source: They will be put in “disabled” state.
trans-unit.target: They will be put in “disabled” state.

trans-unit.source: If you do not transition to production mode by the expiration of your trial, your RemoteApp collections will be disabled.
trans-unit.target: If you do not transition to production mode by the expiration of your trial, your RemoteApp collections will be disabled.

trans-unit.source: Don't worry - Your settings and users’ data are saved for another 90 days, so you can still activate your service and switch to production mode without any data loss.
trans-unit.target: Don't worry - Your settings and users’ data are saved for another 90 days, so you can still activate your service and switch to production mode without any data loss.
